dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, [Host_B], you know, we were just looking at some, uh, fascinating insights into, like, the giants of the investment world, and, well, Warren Buffett's portfolio always comes up, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Host B, you know, we were just looking at some, uh, fascinating insights into, like, the giants of the investment world, and, well, Warren Buffett's portfolio always comes up, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! The Oracle of Omaha. Always interesting to see where he's putting his money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! The Oracle of Omaha. Always interesting to see where he's putting his money.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And the numbers are just, like, *massive*. I was just looking at his top holdings for Berkshire Hathaway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And the numbers are just, like, massive. I was just looking at his top holdings for Berkshire Hathaway.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, hit me with it. What's, uh, what's sitting at number one?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, hit me with it. What's, uh, what's sitting at number one?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, surprisingly for some, it's Kraft Heinz. We're talking over 325 million shares, a market value of $25.3 billion. That's almost 19% of his entire portfolio.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, surprisingly for some, it's Kraft Heinz. We're talking over three hundred twenty five million shares, a market value of twenty five point three billion dollars. That's almost nineteen percent of his entire portfolio.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1. Kraft Heinz Position: 325.6 M shares Market Value: $25.3B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 18.7%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, Kraft Heinz, still such a huge bet for him. I mean, [interrupts] that's a lot of ketchup.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, Kraft Heinz, still such a huge bet for him. I mean, that's a lot of ketchup.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Right? And then, right behind it, um, Wells Fargo. Almost $24 billion, making up 17.7% of the portfolio.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And then, right behind it, um, Wells Fargo. Almost twenty four billion dollars, making up seventeen point seven percent of the portfolio.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 2. Wells Fargo Position: 479.7 M shares Market Value: $24 B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 17.7%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wells Fargo, okay. So the banks still figure heavily then. Classic Buffett, really.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wells Fargo, okay. So the banks still figure heavily then. Classic Buffett, really.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely. And you can't talk about Buffett without mentioning Coca-Cola, can you? That's number three.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely. And you can't talk about Buffett without mentioning Coca-Cola, can you? That's number three.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 3. Coca-Cola Position: 400 M shares Market Value: $18.1 B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 13.4%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Coke! Of course. [interrupts] I mean, it's practically synonymous with him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Coke! Of course. I mean, it's practically synonymous with him.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Four hundred million shares, $18.1 billion, 13.4%. Just a massive, long-term play there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Four hundred million shares, eighteen point one billion dollars, thirteen point four percent. Just a massive, long-term play there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 3. Coca-Cola Position: 400 M shares Market Value: $18.1 B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 13.4%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, the top three alone are over 50% of his portfolio. That's, uh, pretty concentrated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, the top three alone are over fifty percent of his portfolio. That's, uh, pretty concentrated.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1. Kraft Heinz ... Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 18.7% ... 2. Wells Fargo ... Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 17.7% ... 3. Coca-Cola ... Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 13.4%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And then you've got IBM and American Express rounding out the top five, you know, still huge numbers, but stepping down quite a bit from those top three.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And then you've got I B M and American Express rounding out the top five, you know, still huge numbers, but stepping down quite a bit from those top three.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 4. IBM Position: 81 M shares Market Value: $11.6 B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 8.6% ... 5. American Express Position: 151.6 M shares Market Value: $9 B Berkshire Portfolio Weight: 6.6%

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: IBM, interesting. And Amex, another financial staple. It just really shows his preference for, like, established, reliable brands.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I B M, interesting. And Amex, another financial staple. It just really shows his preference for, like, established, reliable brands.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It's all about those solid, household names, often consumer staples or financial institutions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. It's all about those solid, household names, often consumer staples or financial institutions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no crazy tech startups for good old Warren, huh? Just, uh, [interrupts] the tried and true.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no crazy tech startups for good old Warren, huh? Just, uh, the tried and true.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] Pretty much. Itâ€™s a masterclass in long-term, value investing, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. It's a masterclass in long-term, value investing, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Always a good reminder to, uh, look at the fundamentals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Always a good reminder to, uh, look at the fundamentals.
